explains: n. 非金属桩；椿材（piling 的复数）
wordGroup: piling machine 打桩机；堆布机

sentences.en: Huff designed the timber pilings to be partially concealed by the house's ground-to-roof shell.
sentences.cn: 霍夫设计的木桩有一部分是隐藏在房子地面到其屋顶的外墙里的。

sentences.en: To further protect the house from hurricane damage, Huff raised it 2.7 meters off the ground on timber pilings.
sentences.cn: 为了进一步保护房子不受飓风的破坏，哈夫用木桩将它抬高了2.7米。

sentences.en: Huff raised it 2.7 meters off the ground on timber pilings—long, slender columns of wood anchored deep in the sand.
sentences.cn: Huff 用木桩将它抬高了2.7米，这条木桩又长又细，深深固定在沙子里。
